summary:
Very talented Director to hunt, build and exceed business goals with superb experience in Enterprise Sales, Sales Management, Professional Services in B2B & B2C businesses. 

Hunter and goal-performance driven attitude. Experience and successes gained working for start-ups and turnarounds; Global Enterprise Software Vendors and Managed Service Providers.

Excellent management-, and business skills, who leads by example in start-up-, accelerate-
and turn-around environments.

Have managed departments such as: Sales, Finance, Operations, HR, Implementation, Consultancy, Marketing, Customer Service, PR, Back-office.

Certified Manager (CM) Institute of Certified Professional Managers, Virginia, USA.

Core qualifications:
✔ Excellent communication skills.
✔ Team building- and leadership skills.
✔ Track record of exceptional sales results.
✔ Thorough understanding of C-level business environments.
✔ Successful International experience: EMEA, APAC, CEE, CIS, Russia.

Core accomplishments:
✔ Achieving P & L targets.
✔ Boost new order intake year-over-year.
✔ Ensure signing of key contracts, value range US$ 5 - 46 mi.
✔ Successfully started business in EMEA and Russia, CEE and Asia.
✔ Attend President's Club Global Top Performers for 7 years.

awards.title: Netiq President's Club - EMEA Top Sales Performers 2005
Novell President's Club - Global Top Sales Performers 2008
Novell President's Club - Global Top Sales Performers 2009
Novell President's club - Global Top Sales Performers 2010
Pitney Bowes President's Club - EMEA Top Sales Performers 1998
Pitney Bowes President's Club - EMEA Top Sales Performers 1999

profile_positions.description:
Ahlers provides state-of-the-art services and excellent client experiences, by understanding your local- and global needs to address your Business Process Management- and Operational challenges.

The Trade Facilitation and BPO Infrastructure Services gives you excellence for your daily Management and Operations, to save costs and increase profitability and revenues. 

You will achieve your business targets with our scalable platform by outsourcing Business Processes for:
- Supply Chain services
- IT Technology-, Risk Management- and Security services
- Payment-, Financial- and Accounting services
- Sourcing- and Procurement services
- Data Analytics- and Data Science

Ultimately you will accelerate your business without any burden.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Director - Global Trade Facilitation & BPO Services

profile_positions.description:
SCHNEIDER GROUP – 500 experts, 11 offices in 8 countries, provides its international clients with the market entry, advisory, and back-office services they need to expand their business into or within Armenia, Belarus, Kazakhstan, Poland, Russia, Ukraine, and Uzbekistan.

Our services include market entry support, accounting outsourcing, tax consulting, import, ERP systems, CFO services, IT services and support in the settlement of disputes and advice on a broad range of legal issues with a focus on compliance, migration, labor, contract, and corporate law.
Your one-stop partner in Russian-speaking countries and Poland.

EMEAR Sales & Marketing:
- define, implement and executing the Enterprise B2B Sales & Marketing strategy.
- generate and accelerate new business
- reporting & forecasting
profile_positions.title: Commercial Director

profile_positions.description:
->  EMEAR Business Consultancy and Advisory.
- setting and executing Enterprise B2B Go-to-Market strategy
- building and accelerate new business
- building business in new territories
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description:
Kaspersky Lab is a global cybersecurity company founded in 1997. Kaspersky Lab’s deep threat intelligence and security expertise is constantly transforming into security solutions and services to protect businesses, critical infrastructure, governments and consumers around the globe.

The company’s comprehensive security portfolio includes leading endpoint protection and a number of specialized security solutions & services to fight sophisticated and evolving digital threats.
Over 400 million consumers are protected by Kaspersky Lab technologies and we help 270,000 Corporate clients protect what matters most to them.

•	Develop, maintain, lead and direct successfully the European organisation.
•	Achieve objectives for Sales, Revenue, P&L, Customer success, Brand awareness.  
•	Build and manage relationships with key European businesses.
•	Identify new opportunities to grow business in SMB, Enterprise, On-Line and Retail.
•	Set Go-to-Market strategy, focus and goals to achieve revenue targets.
•	Launched Security Solutions for GDPR, GRC, Fraud, Industrial Cyber, Threat Management.
profile_positions.title: Managing Director Europe
Managing Director Europe + Acting Director DACH
Managing Director Europe + Acting Director UK&I

profile_positions.description:
Difuzed is a leading design business which develops lifestyle products for a wide range of entertainment-, fashion-, sports- and consumer goods brands for apparel & fashion accessories.

In partnership with more than 100 of the world’s best known and most prestigious brands, we supply every Retail tier across the Globe, including a range of outlets from independent gaming stores, specialty retail, department and fashion stores, super and hyper market through to e-commerce.

As Sales Director I am accountable for new business Sales and Marketing for retail and e-Commerce.

Achieving sales- and revenue targets by defining and executing the successful go-to-market Sales and Marketing strategies and also in charge of the strategic direction of the Bioworld brands.

Responsible for building, training and retaining a local- and global sales team.
profile_positions.title: Vice President of Global Sales (interim assignment)

profile_positions.description:
As Vice President accountable for Enterprise B2B Sales and Marketing in the key target regions: Europe, Benelux, CEE, Baltics & Nordics, Russia, CIS and Asia. 

Generate new business revenue and gain market share by focussing on Carrier/Telecom (Wholesale), Multi-Nationals, local Enterprises and Governments through Direct Sales and Business Partnerships, by securing new business.

Achieving sales- and revenue targets by defining and executing the successful go-to-market sales strategies and marketing for the current three business lines and upcoming solutions.

Linx Group solutions:
- Datacenter services
- Managed Security Services
- Cloud services (Cisco, NetApp, VMware, CommVault, Microsoft)
- Carrier / Telecom / Connectivity services
- Services: business support services, data- and network security, network operations, monitoring.
profile_positions.title: Vice President of Global Sales

profile_positions.description:
BU Director, Identity- & Security Management Novell Benelux B.V.
Responsible for achieving new business order intake targets, across all routes to market in order to achieve revenue targets and corporate objectives.

Leads the team of Sales Managers, Partner Managers, Technology Specialists and Marketing.

Novell Software solutions:
- Identity Management
- Access Management
- Data Management
- Policy Management
- Governance-, Risk- and Compliance Management
- Infrastructure Management
- Systems- and Configuration Management
- Security- Incident- and Event Management
- Biometric Security Management
- Data- and Network Security
- Endpoint Security

Market segments, such as: Multi-Nationals, Enterprises, Governments, Finance, Utilities, Healthcare, Manufacturing.

Selling direct and through/with Business Partners, Global System Integrators and Technology Partners. 

Coöperate with Novell Consulting for successful project implementations.
profile_positions.title: Director Business Unit Security

profile_positions.description:
As a Sales Manager, by doing solution selling (business + it), responsible for achieving new business sales targets through hunting, prospecting and doing new business at all levels, including C-level, within complex organisations, such as large- and very large Enterprises and Governments.

Novell Software solutions:
- Identity Management

- Governance-, Risk- and Compliance Management
- Infrastructure Management

- Security- Incident- and Event Management

Market segments, such as: Multi-Nationals, Enterprises, Governments, Finance, Utilities, Healthcare, Manufacturing.

Coöperate with Novell Consulting for succesfull project implementations and to achieve my Consulting order- and revenue targets.
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager
